CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT(Month__c )) ) && NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( Year__c )) ) , CASE(Month__c, "January","1", "February","2", "March","3", "April","4", "May","5", "June","6", "July","7", "August","8", "September","9", "October","10", "November","11", "December","12", "") + "/" +"1"+ "/" + TEXT(Year__c),NULL)
CustomField.label: Month start date
